animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to eat grass in the field.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🔔 Farmers keep me on their farms.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts!
🐘 I am a very big animal.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I hatch from an egg.
🦆 I have webbed feet to help me swim.
🌾 I eat plants and small bugs.

animal.question: I meow and like to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈 I purr when you pet me.
🐟 I sometimes eat fish.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕 I am a good friend and pet.
🎾 I like to play fetch.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots on my body.
🍃 I live in Africa.
🌳 I am the tallest mammal.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse but with stripes.
🏜️ I live in Africa.
🐾 My stripes help me camouflage.

animal.question: I hop and have a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat grass and plants.
🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🦘 I carry my baby in my pouch.

animal.question: I roar and am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane around my face.
🍖 I am a carnivore.
👑 I am a very powerful cat.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are scared of me.
🌊 I am a fish but not like a goldfish.
📍 I live in almost every ocean.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet.
☔ You need an umbrella when I come down.
🌱 Plants need me to live.

weather.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am very hot.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Flowers turn to face me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like cotton.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌧️ Sometimes I bring rain.

weather.question: I can be strong or gentle, and I make the trees sway. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow leaves off trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I am air that moves.

weather.question: I am cold and white, and I fall in the winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice crystals.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of rain, thunder and lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I have bright flashes in the sky.
⛈️ I can be scary.
🔊 You hear loud booms when I am near.

weather.question: I appear after the rain, and I have many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like a colorful arch.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
☀️ The sun and rain are needed for me to appear.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I can be small or big and bumpy. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and cold.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
❄️ I usually happen during a thunderstorm.

weather.question: I am a very big storm over the ocean with strong winds that spin around in a circle. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can cause big waves.
🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌪️ I am also known as a cyclone in some parts of the world.

weather.question: I am a cloud on the ground, that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud, but lower.
🚗 You need to drive slowly when I am around.
💧 I am made of tiny water droplets.
